About us
Shenzhen E-Ran Technology is a professional manufacturer for consumer products such as Bluetooth Speakers, Wearable Devices, Fitness band and Smart watches, MP3/MP4 players. Our products are being sold in global supermarkets and chain stores.
With 11 years' history, E-Ran already developed in to a 2800 square meter factory and with 120 workers, 10 engineers and 30 sales specialists.
We also have rich experience for providing OEM/ODEM service for global clients.
Our factory is ISO9001-2008 certified, and also passed audits conducted by BV, SGS, TUV, and our products meet the international quality standards and have the certifications such
CE, FCC, ROHS, etc.
With the motto â€œClient first, good product, best serviceâ€�,
E-Ran has been devoting itself to improving the quality of products and service.
We have won the favor and trust and already built long term business relationship with several global big companies.
Meanwhile, with two offices, one in Shenzhen and another in USA, we can provide the efficient and best service to our clients. Domestic and global clients are warmly welcome to join us to build a beautiful future together.

results.title: Shenzhen E-Ran Technology Co., Ltd. | VentureRadar
results.content: "E-Ran is a high-tech enterprise specialized in the R&D and manufacturing of the Bluetooth MP3 player, Bluetooth Speaker and Smart Healthy Bracelet. With a workforce of 180 staffs and a factory housing four production lines, 80 percent of our output goes to overseas markets, benefiting clients in America, Europe and South America."

E-Ran is a high-tech enterprise specialized in the R&D and manufacturing of the Bluetooth MP3 player, Bluetooth Speaker and Smart Healthy Bracelet. With a workforce of 180 staffs and a factory housing four production lines, 80 percent of our output goes to overseas markets, benefiting clients in America, Europe and South America.CES 2015
Similar Companies:
Shenzhen E-Tech Digital Technology Co., LTD.Unknownn/aShenzhen E-Tech Digital Technology Co. LTD. is a professional Smartphone and Tablet PC manufacturer, which provides OEM & ODM service of consumer electronic products to famous brand companies all over the world. It established in 2006 and registered in HK, We have been in consumer electronics manufacturing field for more than 11 years.E-Tech has continually passed UL factory audit and ISO9001 certificate. Now our products have passed all kinds of global certificates, such as CE, WEEE, RoHs, FCC etc.
Shenzhen EasyN Technology Co., Ltd.Unknownn/aEasyN was founded in 1999. We are focused on smarthome security products with over 15 years manufacturing and R&D experience. We have a professional IP camera factory with over 500 skilled workers in Shenzhen and supply a complete range of IP camera products with CE, FCC and ISO RoHS certification. OEM/ODM orders are welcomed.
Shenzhen Honestda Electronic Co., Ltd.Chinan/aShenzhen Honestda Electronic Co. Ltd., established in 2010, is a high-tech manufacturer dedicated to power solutions. Our main products are mobile power bank, chargers, USB cable, which have CE, ROHS, FCC certificates. Our factory covers an area of 10,000 square meters and has 25 production lines.
Sky Wing Communication Electronics Co., Ltd.Unknownn/aSky Wing is a Wal-Mart & SA8000 certified factory which have been specialized in R&D, production and sales of Bluetooth wireless products since 2003, over 12 years of OEM / ODM experience, product have passed the BQB, CE, FCC, RoHS and Reach certifications. We look forward to cooperating with you !.
Shenzhen DO Intelligent Technology Co., LtdUnknownn/aShenzhen DO Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. short in “DO Technology”, is a leading global wearable products solution provider with its own factory with 260 people. The R&D teams founded in 2012. Products have been sold to more than 20 countries and regions. More than 50 R&D engineers devoted in researching and developing step pedometer algorithm, sleep algorithm, heart rate algoritum, etc. Besides, world branded automatic production facilities were invested in production. As the modernized solution provider and manufacturer, we have advanced technology, strong design ability, fully trained workers and professional management, which guaranteed customer’s quick delivery.
M-One Products Ltd.Unknownn/aM-one Products Ltd. MP3/4player, BT speaker, smart wear and VR glass manufacturer in China. Our monthly capacity reaches 100K. We have experienced engineers and skilled OEM/ODM team working under high quality control system to produce perfect goods. We also have CE, FCC, RoHS certificates.
